item.description:

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: 👪 TogetherAI Embeddings 👪 @togethercompute just launched hosted OSS embeddings! Swap it into your JS RAG pipelines in @LangChainAI...
item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
👪 TogetherAI Embeddings 👪

@togethercompute just launched hosted OSS embeddings! Swap it into your JS RAG pipelines in @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 JS/TS community 0.0.17.

The # of dimensions varies by model, so you may need to set up your vectorstore to match:

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/text_embedding/togetherai

item.description:
🦜🚀Deploy LangChain Apps

Over the past few months we've worked on LangServe - an easy way to deploy LangChain apps

Check out this YouTube video by Ugo Osuji that goes over how to deploy them:

🌎Locally
🏃On Google Cloud Run
🏠On Hosted Langserve

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uubXeNyAbPY

item.title: 🚀Build a Conversational RAG with Mistral-7B and LangChain This post by Madhav Thaker covers three important topics: 🦋How to get started with RAG...
item.description:
🚀Build a Conversational RAG with Mistral-7B and LangChain

This post by Madhav Thaker covers three important topics:

🦋How to get started with RAG
💬How to build a chatbot
🦙How to use open source models

Highly recommend reading!

https://medium.com/@thakermadhav/part-2-build-a-conversational-rag-with-langchain-and-mistral-7b-6a4ebe497185

item.description:
LangChain v0.1.0 Highlights

⭐️Agents⭐️

As part of v0.1.0, we:

🖼️Added documentation on the seven different agent types (and when to use each one)
🔗Rewrote agents in LCEL for improved ability to customize

Agent Types: https://python.langchain.com/docs/modules/agents/agent_types/

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=08qXj9w-CG4
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 @togethercompute Embeddings ↗️ Today we’re excited to announce the new langchain-together Python package, which has connecti...
item.description:
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 @togethercompute Embeddings ↗️

Today we’re excited to announce the new langchain-together Python package, which has connections to Together’s LLM and Embeddings endpoints. This is the easiest way to access the next-gen embedding models their team has been developing. Learn… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1745508818442969156


Together AI: We are thrilled to announce the Together Embeddings endpoint! 🚀

Higher quality than OpenAI or Cohere in the MTEB benchmark. ✅
State of the art M2-Retrieval models with up to 32k context length. ✅
Up to 4x lower price. ✅

https://together.ai/blog/embeddings-endpoint-release

Details👇

item.title: LangChain v0.1.0 Highlight ⭐️Retrieval⭐️ One of the main use cases for LangChain is retrieval. Our v0.1.0 release highlights this with: ✂️Large ...
item.description:
LangChain v0.1.0 Highlight

⭐️Retrieval⭐️

One of the main use cases for LangChain is retrieval. Our v0.1.0 release highlights this with:

✂️Large selection of text splitters
🧪Myriad of advanced retrieval techniques
👪Support for multi-tenancy
🏡Indexing pipeline… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1745485078283858057
item.author: LangChain

item.title: ✂️Semantic Chunking In case you missed it, @GregKamradt is doing a great series on the "5 Levels of Text Splitting" One of the more interesting idea...
item.description:
✂️Semantic Chunking

In case you missed it, @GregKamradt is doing a great series on the "5 Levels of Text Splitting"

One of the more interesting ideas he introduces is "Semantic Chunking", where you use embedding distance to split text into chunks

Now in langchain-experimental!… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1745483297365578199
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Harrison Chase: I thought this was a really creative new way of splitting text So we added it to `langchain_experimental`🦜🧪 Check it out here...
item.description:
RT Harrison Chase
I thought this was a really creative new way of splitting text

So we added it to `langchain_experimental`🦜🧪

Check it out here: https://python.langchain.com/docs/modules/data_connection/document_transformers/semantic-chunker

And watch @GregKamradt's excellent video below to better understand it!


Greg Kamradt: 5 Levels Of Text Splitting: Semantic Splitting

Goal: Use embeddings to find chunks in our raw text

Experimental method using embedding distances between sequential sentences to tease out 'breakpoints'

If we find a good breakpoint, make a chunk

Check out the full video on YT
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: 🪵🎲 Using OpenAI Logprobs 🎲🪵 Did you know OpenAI can return the generation probability of individual tokens? You can even see...
item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
🪵🎲 Using OpenAI Logprobs 🎲🪵

Did you know OpenAI can return the generation probability of individual tokens?

You can even see odds for top alternatives - sort of like how "confident" the LLM is in a response vs. other options!

Bump to @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 JS/TS OpenAI 0.0.11… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1745476164825563533
item.author: LangChain

5 Levels Of Text Splitting: Semantic Splitting

Create React components with GPT-4-vision within VSCode 😱

Download CodeGPT extension: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=DanielSanMedium.dscodegpt…

item.title: LangChain v0.1.0 Highlight 🧱Output Parsing A big use case of LangChain is connecting it to downstream actions. In order to properly do that, you ne...
item.description:
LangChain v0.1.0 Highlight

🧱Output Parsing

A big use case of LangChain is connecting it to downstream actions. In order to properly do that, you need to structure LLM outputs in specific ways

Output parsing helps accomplish exactly that!

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dbjmhCWPKow
item.author: LangChain

item.title: LangChain v0.1.0 Highlight: 🎏Streaming Streaming is an important UX consideration - both of LLM tokens, as well as intermediate steps. All chains a...
item.description:
LangChain v0.1.0 Highlight:

🎏Streaming

Streaming is an important UX consideration - both of LLM tokens, as well as intermediate steps. All chains and agents come with built in streaming, making it easy to convey what is happening to end users

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gr5CGL4_jpY
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 🚀New LangChain reranker ColBERT via @bclavie's RAGatouille framework
item.description:
🚀New LangChain reranker

ColBERT via @bclavie's RAGatouille framework


Harrison Chase: This is a great addition - ColBERT as a reranker

Makes it really easy to get some of the benefits from ColBERT but in a way where you don't have to update your indexing pipeline

Seamlessly integrates as a LangChain reranker!

https://python.langchain.com/docs/integrations/providers/ragatouille
item.author: LangChain
